item.description:
Discover the new Rose Fitzgerald Kennedy Greenway on this 1 hour mini-tour that will end in Chinatown at dinner time. Tickets are $10 per person and may be purchased from your guide before the start of the tour (cash only).

This walking tour begins under the grand arch of Rowes Wharf now revealed after the removal of the Central Artery overhead. The tour continues through the Dewey Square Parks that offers an interesting interpretation of Boston's transportation hub and Financial District, and on through to the culturally inspired landscaping of the Chinatown Park. Come and experience the present day urban planning that is knitting the city back together.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for your guide under the arch wearing a Boston By Foot pin or shirt.
item.name: The Greenway: Dewey Square to Chinatown
